mapper.insert: insert into item(type, longitude, latitude, address, title, description, sale_price, deposit, monthly_rent, rooms, bathrooms, size, member_id, created_at, updated_at, sold) values (#{type}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{address}, #{title}, #{description}, #{salePrice}, #{deposit}, #{monthlyRent}, #{rooms}, #{bathrooms}, #{size}, #{memberId}, now(), now(), false)
